AAD.DE.summary: Amadeus FiRe AG provides specialized personnel services in Germany. The company operates in two segments, Temporary Staffing/Interim and Project Management/Permanent Placement; and Training. It offers personnel services for professionals and executives in the fields of accounting, office, banking, and IT. The company also provides training in preparation for state examinations for tax advisors and specialists, accountants, and financial controllers; professional training in the fields of tax, accounting, and financial control; and education and training in IAS/IFRS and US-GAAP. In addition, it runs recognized private certificate courses primarily designed to prepare participants for professional practice in the field of accounting. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
